Interfaces

Interface Cell

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cell

    public interface Cell
extends java.util.Observer
    Interface voor de klasse Cell.
    Author:
    Maarten Flikkema, Liam Clark, Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue()
        Method to get the current value of the cell, for example "5", "4", "hello".
        Returns:
        value of this cell

      • getInput

        java.lang.String getInput()
        Method to get the current input of the cell, for example "=ADD(3,2)", "4", "hello".
        Returns:
        input of this cell

      • inputIsFunction

        boolean inputIsFunction()
        Check of de input van de cel een formule bevat.
        Returns:
        true als er een functie/formule in de input staat.

      • setInput

        void setInput(java.lang.String newInput)
        Method to change the current input of the cell.
        Parameters:
        newInput - is the new input to parse

      • updateValue

        void updateValue()
        Method to update the value parameter. Checks is input contains a formula, if it does, it calculates the formula, else is takes over the value of input

      • getRow

        int getRow()
        Returns:
        the row index of the row (row 1 == index 0)

      • getColumn

        int getColumn()
        Returns:
        the column index of the row (column A == index 0)

      • getColumnString

        java.lang.String getColumnString()
        Returns:
        the column in user friendly form (e.a.: "A", "F", "AF") (column A == column 1 == index 0)

      • getType

        CelType getType()
        Method to get the overlay data type of this cell.
        See Also:
        CelType

      • setType

        void setType(CelType newType)
        Method to get the overlay data type of this cell.
        Parameters:
        newType - is the new data type
        See Also:
        CelType
